text: Zoe Simmons (left) and Ella Warner greet Chi Chi, the golden retriever who was tortured and left for dead in a trash bag in South Korea, after the dog’s arrival for adoption in Los Angeles on Friday. Chi Chi who had all four legs amputated after irreparable damage from being bound and hung upside in a dog meat market will go to a new home in Arizona. — Photo: AFP
title: Love heals
